title: A Huge 2nd Amendment Win, And An Explosive Dinesh D’Souza Interview (Ep 1797)
description:
In this episode, I address the huge win at the Supreme Court for the Second Amendment. I also interview Dinesh D’Souza and he fires back at critics of 2000 Mules. 

News Picks:


Watch 2000 Mules here.


There is no “fire in a movie theater” law. It’s a hoax. 


Google Is Muscling in on the Healthcare Market.


I shred the Philly Enquirer editorial board’s defense of Biden on gas prices (bring on the receipts!)
